mapper.select: /* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentDtoList */ SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NO , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.REGPE_ID = U.USER_ID AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getLowCommentDtoList */ SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NO , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.REGPE_ID = U.USER_ID AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} AND C.PARENT = #{parent} ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC
